replies.msg:
有2個list, 想問下巴打覺得值唔值

要求： 只要打到RE2 就可以了。 主要用黎打RE2 同堆舊game

List 1:

MSI Radeon RX 560 4GB Graphics Card
AMD Ryzen 3 2200G Processor
ASUS B450M-A/CSM
CORSAIR Vengeance LPX 8GB DDR4 RAM 3000
EVGA 500 BR 80+ BRONZE Power Supply
ADATA SU800 128GB SSD
Thermaltake Versa H17
Micro ATX Computer Case
ARCTIC F12 Silent - Ultra-Quiet 120 mm Case Fan


List 2:

Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB EVGA Graphics card
MSI B350M PRO-VDH AM4 Motherboard
AMD Ryzen 3 1200 Processor
Ballistix Sport 8GB DDR4 RAM 2400
EVGA 430W Power Supply
WD Blue 1TB Hard Drive
ROSEWILL Micro ATX Case
其實有諗過，不過想玩返aoe,c&c 個d 舊game
